content:
Ricardo Chavarriaga (CLAIRE Office Switzerland) said:

PhD position in Computer Science in artificial intelligence applied to biochemistry financed by a Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie H2020 EU Project. A wonderful opportunity to work with a startup in Winterthur (CH) in collaboration with many great universities in all Europe!

More information on the job can be found here: http://toelt.ai/jobs/
